attributes.action: consider family circumstances when allocating educational maintenance allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current payments are based on family income alone and take no account of the circumstances, thus hugely discriminating against large families. In our case we earn over the threshold to qualify for payment and no allowance is made for the fact that this income has to support 7 people. When my elder children go to college their peers will be receiving up to £30 a week while they will get nothing, grossly unfair.
